# Mount-MCDBootImage

Source: `source/Private/Workspace/BootImage/Mount-MCDBootImage.ps1`

## Synopsis

Mounts a Windows PE boot.wim image for servicing.

## Description

Mounts a Windows PE boot.wim image to a specified mount path using DISM. The
mounted image can then be modified by adding packages, drivers, or files.
Uses the Mount-WindowsImage cmdlet for the mount operation.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | Mandatory | Pipeline | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| ImagePath | String | Yes | No | Full path to the boot.wim file to mount. |
| MountPath | String | Yes | No | Directory path where the image will be mounted. The directory must exist. |
| Index | Int32 | No | No | Image index within the WIM file to mount. Defaults to 1 (WinPE has only one image). |

## Examples

### Example 1

```powershell
Mount-MCDBootImage -ImagePath 'C:\WinPE\media\sources\boot.wim' -MountPath 'C:\WinPE\mount'

Mounts the boot.wim to the specified mount path.
```
